item.val: Okinawa Water Sports Center – Marine Club BERRY
Okinawa water sports center provide English, Mandarin and Cantonese speaking marine staff

Marine Club BERRY is the main water sports center in Okinawa since year 2001 that operate whole year round. Due to weather concern Marine Club BERRY have 3 branches that cover east and west side of Okinawa, with the location coverage there is no worry about the weather or sea condition on your holiday plan for water sports with Marine Club BERRY. Marine Club BERRY offer numbers of water sports activity in Okinawa.
An underwater experience walking around sandy bottom with lots of coral and fishes around you. Underwater experience around 20 mins.
This is for anyone who are not certified as a diver but who wish to try, this program only conduct by Instructor. Under water swim around 20 mins
Snorkeling around at the shallow reef with colour fishes and coral , accompany by Instructor

item.key: ###Marine Club BERRY Activity Daily Time Schedule###

item.val: Challenging water sports, max for 8 person.
A popular water drifter, just like you are sitting flat platform and is drifting all the time, max 3 person.
Biscuit Drift, Super Marble and Banana boat ride
Super Marble, Banana boat, Biscuit Drift and Water Tube
Beautiful mangrove river covers with green give you a peaceful moment and atmosphere.
A sea kayak tour to visit one of the blue cave, and, snorkeling around at YODOKARI island.

Marine Club BERRY organizes leisure diving around Manza and Nakama area in Okinawa. The diving site is unique from the seascape with beautiful nudibranch, shrimp or school of fusilier, sea turtle, and grouper. Popular dive site Cape, Onna Point, Honsyu, Manzamou Shita, Manza Coral, Over Head Rock, Manza Dream Hole, Mini Dream Hole, Seragaki Out leaf, Nakayukui, Cross Line, Nakama Point, Afro and Bitaro.
Includes: tank, weight, boat and underwater guide only
Mask with Snorkel Tube, Bootie, Fins (Open Heel)
Theory review and underwater basic skill review by Instructor

Click on BOOKING NOW, you will require to fill in your email address as your contact. Fill in all information as required and summit. You will receive a PayPal deposit request from SEASIR LTD. account, to secure your booking please make your deposit of JPY4,000 per person within 3 days start from the day you receive deposit request from our PayPal account, or within 24 hours if your booking request is less than less than 3 days from the departure date. All booking request will cancel if no deposit receive.

• Require to book with a minimum of 2 people.
  • Diver who has not been diving for more than 12 months and less than 30 dive log experience is required to take Refresher Dive Course Package.

• Shoulder width should be above 38cm.
  • Please make sure you have 18 hours resting hour before the flight.
Parasailing wing is towed by a boat, you will to enjoy the great view from the sky. Riding experience around 10~15 mins.
Want to know how Iron Man hover around, a similar system using water jet. But this required body weight from 40 – 90 kg only.
